name: PrionDiseaseTestsForAbnormalPrionProtein
title: Prion Disease (Tests for Abnormal Prion Protein)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test panel names associated with detecting the presence of abnormal prion protein in a clinical specimen by any method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: abnormal prion protein),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
